title: Climate Watch
summary: Climate Watch is an open online platform designed to empower users with the climate data, visualizations and resources they need to gather insights on national and global progress on climate change, sustainable development, and help advance the goals of the Paris Agreement.
description: Climate Watch is an open online platform designed to empower users with the climate data, visualizations and resources they need to gather insights on national and global progress on climate change, sustainable development, and help advance the goals of the Paris Agreement.
citation: Climate Watch. 2020. Washington, DC: World Resources Institute. Available online at: https://www.climatewatchdata.org/
